title: THE INVESTIGATOR
author: John Sandford
description: Letty Davenport, the adopted daughter of Lucas Davenport, looks into oil thefts in Texas.

title: IT ENDS WITH US
author: Colleen Hoover
description: A battered wife raised in a violent home attempts to halt the cycle of abuse.

title: WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING
author: Delia Owens
description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.

title: VERITY
author: Colleen Hoover
description: Lowen Ashleigh is hired by the husband of an injured writer to complete her popular series and uncovers a horrifying truth.

title: THE SEVEN HUSBANDS OF EVELYN HUGO
author: Taylor Jenkins Reid
description: A movie icon recounts stories of her loves and career to a struggling magazine writer.

title: RUN, ROSE, RUN
author: Dolly Parton and James Patterson
description: A singer-songwriter goes to Nashville seeking stardom but is followed by her dark past.

title: THE SACRED BRIDGE
author: Anne Hillerman
description: Chee seeks to solve a mystery that eluded Leaphorn decades ago while Manuelito gets into a life-threatening situation.

title: UGLY LOVE
author: Colleen Hoover
description: Tate Collins and Miles Archer, an airline pilot, think they can handle a no strings attached arrangement. But they can't.

title: THE VISCOUNT WHO LOVED ME
author: Julia Quinn
description: The second book in the Bridgerton series. Kate Sheffield gets in the way of Anthony Bridgerton's intent to marry.

title: SEA OF TRANQUILITY
author: Emily St. John Mandel
description: A detective investigating in the wilderness discovers that his actions might affect the timeline of the universe.

title: WHAT HAPPENED TO THE BENNETTS
author: Lisa Scottoline
description: A brush with members of a drug-trafficking organization ushers a suburban family to go into the witness protection program.

title: THE DUKE AND I
author: Julia Quinn
description: The first book in the Bridgerton series. Daphne Bridgerton’s reputation soars when she colludes with the Duke of Hastings. The basis of the Netflix series “Bridgerton.”

title: NOVEMBER 9
author: Colleen Hoover
description: Is Ben using his relationship with Fallon as fodder for his novel?

title: THE PARIS APARTMENT
author: Lucy Foley
description: Jess has suspicions about her half-brother’s neighbors when he goes missing.

title: THE LOVE HYPOTHESIS
author: Ali Hazelwood
description: A young professor agrees to pretend to be a third-year Ph.D. candidate’s boyfriend.
